detail_desc: Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high paper bag waist, belt with a metal buckle, and zip fly with a button.
Sandals with jute-covered wedge heels and narrow fabric straps that tie around the ankle and have a decorative tassel at the ends. Fabric insoles.
Cropped top in a crinkled viscose weave with lace details and hole embroidery. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with a wrapover front and an elasticated hem.
Sandals in grained imitation leather with a toe strap, narrow straps at the heel and around the ankle and a metal buckle with elastic.
Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather with covered heels, narrow foot straps and a narrow, double ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 7 cm.
Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather with covered heels, narrow foot straps and a narrow, double ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 7 cm.
Boxy-style shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves.
Boxy-style shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves.
Boxy-style shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Wide shorts in taffeta made from recycled polyester with gathers at the top and a wide waistband with pleats. Discreet pockets in the side seams and sequined appliqué decorations in the shape of flowers. Regular waist, a concealed zip and a wide, sewn on tie belt at one side. Unlined.
Metal earrings in various designs, one pair of studs and seven pairs of hoops. The studs and one pair of hoops are decorated with rhinestones. Length from 0.8 cm to 3 cm.
Cropped top in a crinkled viscose weave with a deep V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and short puff sleeves.Wide smocking around the sleeves and hem.
A pair of metal hoop earrings decorated with faceted plastic beads. Diameter 3 cm.
Large plastic earrings with rectangular pendants. Length 8.5 cm.
Large plastic earrings with rectangular pendants. Length 8.5 cm.

Short-sleeved boiler suit in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels, a V-neck and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Short, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and long sleeves with a tab at the cuffs. Handwarmer pockets, large patch front pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Three-strand metal chain necklace. One of the chains has a round, hammered pendant. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
Smocked skirt in a viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Smocked skirt in a viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Smocked skirt in a viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Thin metal chain necklaces with a rod-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 51-58 cm and 77-84 cm. Length of pendants 4.5 cm and 5.5 cm.
Metal earrings with pendants in the form of chain links and pearly, asymmetric plastic bead at the bottom. Length 7 cm.
A pair of hoop earrings in metal decorated with a pearly plastic bead. Diameter approx. 4 cm.

Padded parka in woven fabric. Detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and a single back vent. Diamond-quilted lining in recycled polyester.
Metal earrings in various designs. 22 pairs of studs and 3 pairs of hoops. Size from 0.2 cm to 1.7 cm.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood. High collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard and fabric tab with a text print. Zipped side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood. High collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard and fabric tab with a text print. Zipped side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood. High collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard and fabric tab with a text print. Zipped side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.

Fitted, lightly padded jacket in a quilted weave with a zip down the front and a lightly padded hood with a wide, soft faux fur trim. Diagonal, zipped front pockets and long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Elasticated drawstring to define the waist and narrow, concealed elastication at the hem. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets at the top, fake front pockets with a decorative flap, a drawstring at the waist, and a single back vent. Faux shearling lining at the top and a quilted lining made from recycled polyester below. The padding is made from recycled polyester.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets at the top, fake front pockets with a decorative flap, a drawstring at the waist, and a single back vent. Faux shearling lining at the top and a quilted lining made from recycled polyester below. The padding is made from recycled polyester.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets at the top, fake front pockets with a decorative flap, a drawstring at the waist, and a single back vent. Faux shearling lining at the top and a quilted lining made from recycled polyester below. The padding is made from recycled polyester.

Dress in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a collar and skirt in embroidered tulle. Press-studs at the back, short sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders, and a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping.
Padded coat in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a soft faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Padded coat in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a soft faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Padded coat in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a soft faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.

Jacket in soft faux fur with a zip down the front and a jersey-lined hood with ear-shaped appliqués on top. Patch front pockets and wide, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined. The sleeves are lined in recycled polyester.

Jacket in soft faux fur with a zip down the front and a jersey-lined hood with ear-shaped appliqués on top. Patch front pockets and wide, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined. The sleeves are lined in recycled polyester.
Metal and plastic brooch in the shape of two interlinked rings. The zinc and acrylic content of the brooch are recycled.
Metal and plastic brooch in the shape of two interlinked rings. The zinc and acrylic content of the brooch are recycled.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats around the neckline, a small opening with press-studs at the back of the neck and a seam with concealed elastication at the waist. Lined. The polyester content of the outer layer is partly recycled.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats around the neckline, a small opening with press-studs at the back of the neck and a seam with concealed elastication at the waist. Lined. The polyester content of the outer layer is partly recycled.

Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pin-tucks at the top and short sleeves. Concealed fastening at the top and a seam at the waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-in tie belt. Satin lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pin-tucks at the top and short sleeves. Concealed fastening at the top and a seam at the waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-in tie belt. Satin lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pin-tucks at the top and short sleeves. Concealed fastening at the top and a seam at the waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-in tie belt. Satin lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pin-tucks at the top and short sleeves. Concealed fastening at the top and a seam at the waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-in tie belt. Satin lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a text print on the front, small, ribbed stand-up collar and a zip at the top with a round pull. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Flap chest pocket that fastens with a contrasting colour tab and D-rings.

Boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Flap chest pocket that fastens with a contrasting colour tab and D-rings.
Bucket hat in cotton twill with a cotton sweatband. Width of brim 9 cm.
Bucket hat in cotton twill with a cotton sweatband. Width of brim 9 cm.
T-shirt in heavy cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Relaxed fit with a round neck and dropped shoulders.
T-shirt in heavy cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Relaxed fit with a round neck and dropped shoulders.
T-shirt in heavy cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Relaxed fit with a round neck and dropped shoulders.
Short, straight-cut dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pleat at the front and a double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back. Narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pleat at the front and a double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back. Narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pleat at the front and a double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back. Narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pleat at the front and a double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back. Narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined.
5-pocket cropped jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
5-pocket cropped jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs with raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Studio Collection. Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a deep neckline front and back and zigzag seams along the edges. High-cut legs, and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyamide content of the swimsuit is recycled.
Studio Collection. Sarong in a printed weave made from recycled polyester.
Cropped, sleeveless top in smocked cotton jersey with narrow, bow-topped shoulder straps and overlocked edges at the top and bottom.
Cropped, sleeveless top in smocked cotton jersey with narrow, bow-topped shoulder straps and overlocked edges at the top and bottom.
Studio Collection. Lined, patterned bikini top with a round neck, narrow shoulder straps and zigzag seams around the edges. The polyamide content of the bikini top is recycled.
Studio Collection. Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a low waist, medium coverage at the back and zigzag seams around the edges. The polyamide content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe. Gently draped, double layered top, a seam under the bust, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe. Gently draped, double layered top, a seam under the bust, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short fitted top in ribbed jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Cropped top in airy, fluted jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front and narrow, covered elastication and a tie detail at the hem.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a sweetheart neckline and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Wide smocking at the back and buttons down the front. Double layer at the top.
